results.name: a(1) = a(2) = 1; for n > 2, a(n) = A181819(n) * a(A181819(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10080
mathematica: Nest[Append[#1, #2 #1[[#2]] ] & @@ {#, Times @@ Prime@ FactorInteger[Length@ # + 1][[All, -1]]} &, {1, 1}, 82] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 25 2018 *)
